content: 1 simple flower scrunchie by kalene gardner brilliantbutton crochet size 4 5 inches across by brilliantbutton crochet ©2025 kalene gardner all rights reserved pattern for personal use only not to be distributed copied or resold etc in any way safety disclaimer this is a virus free pdf if it contains embedded links to tutorials and/or social media links all links are to trusted sources but discretion is always advised when using links to external web sites it is up to user discretion to determine the safety of the item they make please remember that beads buttons safety eyes etc can be a hazard to young or destructive children you may sell the final product created by following the pattern but please use your own pictures and reference brilliant button in listings thank you flower scrunchie by brilliantbutton ©2025 kalene gardne 2 abbreviations - us terms st- stitch skip skip chain chain single_crochet- single_crochet sl slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet materials yarn of course hook sizes g 4 mm yarn needle hair tie about 2 inch diameter no metal guage 17 single_crochet stitches by 18 row makes a 4x4 inch square you don t need to stress too much about gauge with these as long as your stitches are even suggested yarn yardage about 12 yards or 25 ounces i used red heart super saver which is a worsted weight 4ply acryllic yarn you can make a two color flower or a single color one you can do any color you d like i enjoyed using brown yellow or green for the centers and i ve used pink yellow red white and purple for the petals if you re struggling to decide on a color take a look at the cover photo for some inspiration notes -this is done in rounds and you will not turn flower scrunchie by brilliantbutton ©2025 kalene gardne 3 - i found that if i held the elastic with the tail in the first round the stitches did not spiral around the hair tie please feel free to contact me with any questions round 1 32 single_crochet around the hair tie sl to the first you can color change with the sl if you are doing two colors 32 tip if your hair tie is larger or smaller you just need to start a single_crochet round in multiples of 4 round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in the same 2 single_crochet chain 4 single_crochet in the same 4 single_crochet x 7 chain 4 single_crochet in the same single_crochet sl to first 40 single_crochet with 8 loops round 3 skip 2 8 double_crochet in the chain 4 loop skip 2 sl x 8 8 petals tie off and tuck in ends do not tuck in your ends around the hair elastic because when it stretches those ends will come loose tuck in your ends inside of the stitches as best as you can block or iron your new hair piece to keep the petals from curling up on each other
